MailSystem

Class MessageQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • MailSystem.MessageQueue

  • public class MessageQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    A first-in, first-out collection of messages. This implementation is not very efficient. We will consider a more efficient implementation in chapter 3.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Message> queue

      Constructs an empty message queue.

      • peek

        public Message peek()
        Get message at head.
        Returns:
        message that is at the head of the queue, or null if the queue is empty
